name: Skye
description: An adventurous feline who keeps you focused with calm encouragement.

name: Ember
description: Keeps your keyboard warm and sparks motivation when energy dips.

name: Lancelot
description: A loyal pup who celebrates every milestone with boundless energy.

name: Rufus
description: A dependable companion who loves celebrating a completed checklist.

name: Wren
description: Chirps cheerful reminders to stretch and sip water between tasks.

name: Harper
description: Glides overhead and keeps distractions grounded while you focus.

name: Pepper
description: A sprightly rabbit who nudges you toward steady daily habits.

name: Willow
description: Finds the calmest nook in the room and invites you to settle in.
